column5: COLUMBIA, S.C. - Abu Garcia® has signed one of the biggest names in Canadian fishing by inking Izumi Outdoors Inc. producer of Bob Izumi’s Real Fishing television show. Izumi Outdoors Inc. joined the Abu Garcia team in a multi-year deal that was signed today. This decision comes in an award-winning year for Abu Garcia.
Sorry I just seen it was already posted !!! Dam iPhone .... Still I guess it's big news ..

I want to be at his Shimano yard sale now that he can sell all he got over the years. Shimano has lot's of new clothing out and the fact that he chooses to put on the Columbia gear must of been a war between sponsors. Abu stinks
